Html: Hi, it's possible to import *.CAB catalogs from Internet?
Hi aadell, Importing Catalog is not supported for now in WPP. I should add this feature in future release.

Hello DCourtel. Have you thought some day for the new release?
In my organization we are looking for this type of software to distribute Adobe updates.
I have tested other software like WPP, but I think the WPP UI is the better than others.
Thank you.

You do not have to deploy Flash player by using catalog. You can publish the msi directly :

How To Deploy Adobe Flash Player

I wish to import catalog of adobe products to make only "Approve", without having to download, create an update package,..
Thanks.
Hum, ok. I see your point of view.
